trans-unit.source: title: Container Ecosystem
trans-unit.target: title: Container Ecosystem

trans-unit.source: Building a Container Ecosystem
trans-unit.target: Building a Container Ecosystem

trans-unit.source: To understand why building a container ecosystem is so important, let's first talk about Docker.
trans-unit.target: To understand why building a container ecosystem is so important, let's first talk about Docker.

trans-unit.source: Docker’s Appeal
trans-unit.target: Docker’s Appeal

trans-unit.source: The concept of containers (namespace isolation and resource governance) has been around for a long time, going back to BSD Jails, Solaris Zones and the basic UNIX chroot (change root) mechanism.
trans-unit.target: The concept of containers (namespace isolation and resource governance) has been around for a long time, going back to BSD Jails, Solaris Zones and the basic UNIX chroot (change root) mechanism.

trans-unit.source: What Docker has done is provide a common toolset, packaging model, and deployment mechanism.
trans-unit.target: What Docker has done is provide a common toolset, packaging model, and deployment mechanism.

trans-unit.source: By doing so, Docker greatly simplified the containerization and distribution of applications.
trans-unit.target: By doing so, Docker greatly simplified the containerization and distribution of applications.

trans-unit.source: Those applications can then run anywhere on any Linux host, a capability we're providing on Windows as well.
trans-unit.target: Those applications can then run anywhere on any Linux host, a capability we're providing on Windows as well.

trans-unit.source: This ubiquitous technology not only simplifies management by offering the same management commands against any host, it also creates a unique opportunity for seamless DevOps.
trans-unit.target: This ubiquitous technology not only simplifies management by offering the same management commands against any host, it also creates a unique opportunity for seamless DevOps.

trans-unit.source: From a developer’s desktop to a testing machine to a set of production machines, a Docker image can be created that will deploy identically across any environment in seconds.
trans-unit.target: From a developer’s desktop to a testing machine to a set of production machines, a Docker image can be created that will deploy identically across any environment in seconds.

trans-unit.source: This story has created a massive and growing ecosystem of applications packaged in Docker containers, with DockerHub, the public containerized-application registry that Docker maintains.
trans-unit.target: This story has created a massive and growing ecosystem of applications packaged in Docker containers, with DockerHub, the public containerized-application registry that Docker maintains.

trans-unit.source: Docker provides a great foundation for development.
trans-unit.target: Docker provides a great foundation for development.

trans-unit.source: Now let's talk about that ecosystem of applications and how you can build on Docker concepts to create a development and deployment workflow suited to your needs.
trans-unit.target: Now let's talk about that ecosystem of applications and how you can build on Docker concepts to create a development and deployment workflow suited to your needs.

trans-unit.source: Components in a container ecosystem
trans-unit.target: Components in a container ecosystem

trans-unit.source: Windows Server Containers are a key component of a large container ecosystem.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server Containers are a key component of a large container ecosystem.

trans-unit.source: We’re working across the industry to deliver developer choice at each layer of the solution stack.
trans-unit.target: We’re working across the industry to deliver developer choice at each layer of the solution stack.

trans-unit.source: The container ecosystem provides ways to manage containers, share containers and develop apps that run in containers.
trans-unit.target: The container ecosystem provides ways to manage containers, share containers and develop apps that run in containers.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft wants to empower developer choice and productivity as they build these next-gen apps.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft wants to empower developer choice and productivity as they build these next-gen apps.

trans-unit.source: Our goal is to fuel developer productivity which means enabling applications to target any Microsoft cloud without having to modify, rewrite, or reconfigure code.
trans-unit.target: Our goal is to fuel developer productivity which means enabling applications to target any Microsoft cloud without having to modify, rewrite, or reconfigure code.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft is committed to being open and ecosystem friendly.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft is committed to being open and ecosystem friendly.

trans-unit.source: We actively support the coming together of multiple developer ecosystems of interest – such as Windows and Linux – to drive innovation.
trans-unit.target: We actively support the coming together of multiple developer ecosystems of interest – such as Windows and Linux – to drive innovation.

trans-unit.source: Over the coming months, we will be providing more information about additional partners in this developing ecosystem.
trans-unit.target: Over the coming months, we will be providing more information about additional partners in this developing ecosystem.
